thread.title: John Podesta: It’s Likely There Were ‘Forces Within the FBI’ That Wanted Clinton to Lose
thread.title_full: John Podesta: It’s Likely There Were ‘Forces Within the FBI’ That Wanted Clinton to Lose

author: Josh Feldman
title: John Podesta: It’s Likely There Were ‘Forces Within the FBI’ That Wanted Clinton to Lose
text:
John Podesta: It’s Likely There Were ‘Forces Within the FBI’ That Wanted Clinton to Lose by Josh Feldman | 7:27   
Hillary Clinton campaign chairman John Podesta recently spoke with John Heilemann about the 2016 campaign and the reasons his candidate lost. Naturally, Podesta brought up Russia and the FBI. 
He talks about “the production of fake news that became fodder in the campaign” and overtook a lot of other issues in the final month of the campaign, reiterating that the Comey letter did “enormous damage.” 
As for the release of his emails by WikiLeaks, Podesta said that his family was harassed and attacked, so the whole ordeal was “obviously painful” to them. 
But he still maintained his criticisms of the FBI’s handling of the situation, calling it “inexplicable that they were so casual about first the investigation of the Russian penetration of the DNC emails, they didn’t even bother to send an agent to the DNC.” 
This in part led him to conclude that it’s certainly a possibility there are “forces within the FBI” that wanted Clinton to lose. 
You can watch the full conversation above, via NewCo.
